document.full_text: after avoiding a suspension for biting a bruin's fingers in game 1, alexandre burrows scored twice in game 2, ending the game in overtime and giving vancouver a 2-0 lead in the stanley cup finals.
document.title: with teeth and goals, burrows gets under bruins' skin
lines_and_colors: after avoiding a suspension for biting a bruin's fingers in game 1, alexandre burrows scored twice in game 2, ending the game in overtime and giving vancouver a 2-0 lead in the stanley cup finals.
